official_title: A bill to designate the Federal courthouse being constructed at 129 Market Street, Youngstown, Ohio, as the "Thomas D. Lambros Federal Courthouse".

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Designates the Federal courthouse being constructed at the intersection of Front and Market Streets, Youngstown, Ohio, as the Thomas D. Lambros United States Courthouse.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Federal courthouse being constructed at 129 Market Street, Youngstown, Ohio, as the "Thomas D. Lambros Federal Courthouse".
